USER: [{'tool_use_id': 'toolu_01CZ54aiunNgAgRWumzgw2ov', 'type': 'tool_result', 'content': 'The file /mnt/Wolf-code/Wolf-Ai-Enterptises/Wolf-Logic-MCP/writers/ingest/swarm_intake_processor.py has been updated. Here's the result of running `cat -n` on a snippet of the edited file:
   113→        "sentiment": sentiment,
   114→        "source": "swarm-intake"
   115→    }
   116→
   117→def watch_directory(directory, prefix):
   118→    """Watch a directory for JSONL files and process new entries"""
   119→    processed = load_processed()
   120→
   121→    # Get today's file
   122→    today = datetime.now().strftime("%Y%m%d")
   123→    target_file = directory / f"{prefix}_{today}.jsonl"
   124→
   125→    if not target_file.exists():
   126→        return processed
   127→
   128→    # Read and process new entries
   129→    with open(target_file, 'r') as f:
   130→        lines = f.readlines()
   131→
   132→    for i, line in enumerate(lines):
   133→        file_key = f"{target_file.name}:{i}"
   134→
   135→        if file_key in processed:
   136→            continue
   137→
   138→        try:
   139→            entry = json.loads(line.strip())
   140→
   141→            # Process transcript
   142→            processed_data = process_transcript(entry)
   143→
   144→            if processed_data:
   145→                # Write to handoff queue
   146→                handoff_file = HANDOFF_DIR / f"intake_{int(time.time()*1000)}_{i}.json"
   147→                with open(handoff_file, 'w') as hf:
   148→                    json.dump(processed_data, hf, indent=2)
   149→
   150→                print(f"[{datetime.now()}] Processed: {file_key} → {handoff_file.name}")
   151→
   152→            # Mark as processed
   153→            mark_processed(file_key)
   154→            processed.add(file_key)
   155→
   156→        except json.JSONDecodeError:
   157→            continue
   158→        except Exception as e:
   159→            print(f"[{datetime.now()}] Error processing {file_key}: {e}")
   160→
   161→    return processed
   162→
   163→def watch_dailys():
   164→    """Watch both dailys and client-dumps directories"""
   165→    print(f"[{datetime.now()}] Starting swarm-intake processor...")
   166→    print(f"[{datetime.now()}] Watching: camera/dailys/ and data/client-dumps/")
   167→
   168→    while True:
   169→        try:
   170→            # Watch camera/dailys for local scripty output
   171→            watch_directory(DAILYS_DIR, "scripty")
   172→
   173→            # Watch data/client-dumps for remote node drops
   174→            watch_directory(CLIENT_DUMPS_DIR, "transcript")
   175→
   176→            time.sleep(30)
   177→
   178→        except KeyboardInterrupt:
   179→            print(f"\n[{datetime.now()}] Stopping swarm-intake")
   180→            break'}]
